input.sentences: an absolutely amazing trip at the fair .
here we saw the monkey maze that my husband dared me to go in .
the ferris wheel that me and honey enjoyed riding .
the swings that we are getting on next .

output.sentences: Our trip to the fair was amazing
I went through the monkey maze with my husband
My honey even rode the ferris wheel with me
He didn't want to ride the swings though
We had a beautiful view leaving the fair.
